author: Paul Rankin
method: To make the fishcakes, place all of the fishcake ingredients, except the oil, into a food processor and blend to a paste. Divide the mixture into two and shape the mixture into two patties. Heat the oil in a frying pan over a medium heat and gently fry the fishcakes for 4-5 minutes on each side, or until completely cooked through. For the vinaigrette, place all of the vinaigrette ingredients into a pan and cook until the red pepper is softened. To serve, place the fishcakes onto a warm plate and spoon the sauce around.
ingredients: 150g/5½oz salmon fillet, skin removed,  1 spring onion, finely chopped,  ½ tsp ground ginger,  2 tsp soy sauce,  small handful fresh coriander, chopped ,  50g/2oz white breadcrumbs,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  2 tsp sesame oil,  1 tbsp olive oil,  1 tbsp sesame oil,  1 tbsp soy sauce,  3 spring onions, finely chopped,  ½ red pepper, finely chopped,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
